summary: This is a Daily Activity Report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 21, 2019. It details routine prison operations, staff shortages, and inmate counts. The report notes that unit 11 South remained on modified operations and lists an inmate (TIM) at a local hospice under USMS guard.

events.title: MCC Daily Operations Report
events.description: Routine prison operations for the day, including staff shortages leading to vacated correctional assignments and an inmate (TIM) being held at an outside hospice.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The report is dated July 22, 2019, and details activities for July 21, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Unit 11 South was reported to remain on 'modified operations until further notice' during the morning watch shift.
Staff shortages led to the vacating of several correctional assignments (10-South #2, SHU #3, SHU #4) throughout the day.
An inmate identified as 'TIM' was noted as being at a 'Local Hospice' under guard by the United States Marshals Service (USMS).
The total inmate population at the beginning of the morning watch shift on July 21, 2019, was 790.
